channel.title: Supervisions on Henrik Røed Sherling
channel.description: Recent content in Supervisions on Henrik Røed Sherling

item.title: Philosophy of Mind
item.description: The philosophy of mind paper involves four supervisions, each with an essay question and a set of required readings. Essays are expected to be around 2000-2500 words in length. 1 Intentionality The first essay question is Do thermostats have beliefs? This is to be answered with reference to the following articles: Dennett, ‘Intentional systems’ Searle, ‘Minds, Brains, and Computers’ Haugeland, ‘Understanding: Dennett and Searle’
